page.title: 14Gala Day
page.content: On the 18th July it was{Gala Day.}It was a very wet morning and everyone was hoping for better weather in the afternoon. At about 1.00 p.m. I ran up the hill to{Village Farm}so that I could get into my costume and onto the Cub's float which was going in procession through the village to the field where the Gala was being held. When we arrived at{Cow Park}the floats were judged. The Brownies were first, the Cubs and the Village School coming joint second. The{Gala Queen}was{Gillian Pearson.} The{South Durham Car Club}were there and you could look at the cars. The {Army}gave rides in their{tanks.}The {Silver Band}played music whilst people spent money at the various stalls. This event is{organised annually}by the{Community Association.}
